desc: At FORTITUDE we offer quality assured energy products formulated by professional healthcare nutritionist for a longer,Strong and healthier life.Our products contain NO PRESERVATIVES nor additives that make it safe for consumption for children.

layout.text: Fortitude Energy Powder uses the natural sweetness of the fruit,that means it is sucrose-free. It uses a naturally sourced smart carbohydrate,providing maximum energy in a more balanced way with low glycaemic pro-file.BY improving fat oxidation during physical activity.It prolongs energy supply.In addition,it is the first non-cariogenic carbohydrate that is gently on teeth
